TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 94. Attempt to insert all the products into your mouth.
95. Undergo nuclear fusion using the products as fuel
96.Mix a buch of cleaning chemicals till smoke appears ,an say "I Puke!".Legal in Texas?
97. Make a very, very, very, VEEEEEEERY loud juicy burp in the aisles.

98: Take down the Wal-Mart sign.

99: Ride the checkout conveyor belt.

100: Repeatedly give the cashier your phone number at checkout.

101: Stand behind the doors to the refrigerated frozen food section.
102: Make 98 more ways.
103. Have a Political flamewar.
104: Shoplift.
105. Take everything in the store without paying.
106. Attempt to steal the store, building and all.
Run inside naked, ask a cashier what year it is, and then scream "YES IT WORKED", and begin dancing around
107.Go ,and get a cart full of milk then push it into a another car ,and watch the big milk spill ,and say "I tripped."
108. explosive diarrhea all over the floor
109. Atomic fart
Run around? Also climb the aisles.

Pour a bowl of vanilla pudding in a empty jar of mayonase and walk in eating it with a spoonm whilst singing 'Sweet Home Alabama!" really loud over the loud speaker then when security comes throw the mayonase at them
112: Shine a laser light into all of the employees eyes.
113. Squirt ketchup over all the employees.
114: Die, They'll kick you out to the hospital and they'll kick you out to the grave.
115. Lose your insanity and attempt to eat everything in the store.
116.Go to the employee ,then get out a hammer ,and a ball filled with whip cream with red food coloring.Now smash the ball filled with whip cream ,and say oops wrong time period.
117. Pretend you have rabies with the whipped cream
118. Taunting the employees with a secret.
119. Taunting me with that secret. I will use those hammers to re-wire you.
120. Attempting to disconnect all the security cameras.
